basicInfo.name: Dellons
basicInfo.flavor: Dellons has regained his sanity and become the ruler of the long-unclaimed Dark Grave. It is said that all the dead await the Grim Reaper's command.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 45% chance to inflict Silence. [Duration: 1 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.
 - Adds Effect: 45% chance to inflict Silence. [Duration: 1 Turn(s)]

Skill 1.name: Deathly Slice
Skill 1.desc:
All Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 115% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 50% chance to inflict Silence. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 135% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Silence chance becomes 60%.

Skill 2.name: Reaper's Advent
Skill 2.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 119% of Physical Attack 5 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 158% of Physical Attack.
超越2段階達成効果
 - Adds Effect: Activates again with 100% power upon defeating an enemy with damage from this skill.

Passive.name: Beyond the Veil
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Physical Damage Boost. [Always Active]
 - Self
 - Grants All Damage Nullification. [Ends After: Taking 3 Hit(s)]
 - Grants All Damage Nullification. [Ends After: Taking 4 Hit(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Physical Damage Boost to 20%.
 - Increases Stacks: All Damage Nullification ends after taking 4 hit(s).
超越6段階達成効果
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: All Damage Nullification when an ally falls in battle. [Ends After: Taking 1 Hit(s)]
 - Adds Effect: 39% Physical Attack Boost when an ally falls in battle. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Princess Claudia, chicken soup, salad, red wine, chaos, evil, injustice, snow
profile.dislikes: Silver (because of the Silverswords), Seven Knights, onions, garlic, order, kindness, justice
profile.story: Dellons has regained his sanity and become the ruler of the long-unclaimed Dark Grave. It is said that all the dead await the Grim Reaper's command.

basicInfo.name: Dellons
basicInfo.flavor: It is not known how the Black Knight Dellons became the Grim Reaper. Judging by his hesitation to cause harm, perhaps he isn't a full Reaper just yet.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
